relation: SWOSU offers online classes which are very convenient
The staff have been very friendly and helpful every step of the way.
pageTitle: Southwestern Oklahoma State University (SWOSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 06/12/2009 Reviewer is A past student here. 8 out of 8 people found this review useful. 1 of 34 Jace from Chicago, IL Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck Has to be one of the best values out there. Did enjoy being here LOVED it here. If you are respectful and demonstrate that you are there to learn, the faculty and staff bend-over-backwards to help you. Loved living in Jefferson Hall. Moved off campus and hated it -- moved back to Jefferson. Did learn a lot What you learn is very dependent on what you put into it. If you're really eager to learn, there are a ton of great faculty that are eager to share their knowledge.
